strings.Value: "Do you mean this isn't a cyclops tomb?"
"We must be careful. Who knows what else is hiding behind the illusions here!"
"Ha ha ha! Funny!"
[Say nothing]
{n}The cyclops body disappears like a ghost. Cephal frowns, and whispers a spell as he looks around cautiously.{/n} "I cannot believe..."
"What does that mean? Why did he disappear?"
"What kind of a devil's spells are these?"
"What is this? Where did he go? Cephal, what can you tell us?"
"There was no cyclops here. We were fighting an illusion."
"The Master must be testing us. Do not abandon hope, and his reward will be ours!"
"I don't understand. This tomb is full of real cyclopes. Why make illusions too?"
"This makes no sense. Was the tomb's creator unable to afford real zombie guards, so he created illusions instead? I thought ancient cyclopes were rich!"
"Quite possible. Either way, the test goes on."
"I understand less and less. And not just about cyclopes."
"Possible! But if so, he saved on more than just guards."

{n}The wizard touches the wall carving, and his hand passes easily through the stone.{/n} "These walls are simple decorations. Underneath them there are ordinary brick walls â€“ still ancient, but much younger than the cyclopes. We are surrounded by illusions."
"I mean I have no idea what it is."
"You're absolutely right. Did everyone hear? Keep your eyes open!"
"I'm glad at least some of us are in a good mood."
"Whatever this means, we can't turn back now. This dungeon may be even more mysterious than we supposed, but we will solve all its riddles. Onward!"
